sermons.title: Abba, Father - The Spirit Of Adoption
Adopted
sermons.description: Bro. Wilkerson explains how you become a part of the family of God when you are born again and all the rights and inheritance you obtain as a child of God. He contrasts the vast difference in the inheritance the devil's family has waiting and the Lord's family.  God's people desperately need to know of a surety their position in Christ. This will defeat much of the work of the enemy in trying to hinder your walk with God. A must hear for every Christian.

sermons.title: Adoption (Rora 2003)
sermons.description: Having begun in the Spirit.  Part 4 of 4; Adoption, a change of relationship.  Delivered at a conference in Devon UK.  “Session 4” examines the neglected Bible truth of ‘adoption’ and its connection with the truth of being ‘sealed with the Spirit’ It unpacks Romans 8 to discover the possibility of an entirely new way of life as we to trust God to enable us to ‘walk in the Spirit.’  This is personal revival, available now.
